ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Updates the resource group of a Function Compute resource.

CreateSession.title: CreateSession
CreateSession.summary: The CreateSession operation creates an explicit session resource. The system automatically generates a unique session ID, pre-allocates a function instance, and associates it with the session. You can specify values for TTL and idle timeout. This method applies to the HEADER_FIELD and GENERATED_COOKIE affinity types. It handles session preload and configuration initialization. After you call the InvokeFunction API, the session information can be included in the InvokeFunction request to enable request routing.

DeleteScalingConfig.title: DeleteScalingConfig
DeleteScalingConfig.summary: Deletes the scaling settings of a function.

DeleteSession.title: DeleteSession
DeleteSession.summary: Deletes the specified session and prohibits new requests from being routed to it. Clears the session metadata from the database, so subsequent requests with the same session ID are treated as new sessions. Releases resources and performs session cleanup. In session isolation scenarios, terminates running requests and releases the instance bound to the session. In non-session isolation scenarios, allows running requests to continue and gracefully terminates them.

DeleteVpcBinding.title: DeleteVpcBinding
DeleteVpcBinding.summary: Deletes an access control policy from a specified policy group for a VPC firewall.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions where Function Compute 3.0 is available.

DisableFunctionInvocation.title: DisableFunctionInvocation
DisableFunctionInvocation.summary: The DisableFunctionInvocation operation prevents a function from being invoked and optionally terminates all requests that are being processed. Once a function's invocation is disabled, no new instances can be created, and the existing provisioned instances are destroyed. This operation is currently in private preview.

EnableFunctionInvocation.title: EnableFunctionInvocation
EnableFunctionInvocation.summary: The EnableFunctionInvocation operation allows a function to be invoked and resumes the creation of provisioned instances. This operation is currently in private preview.

GetAsyncInvokeConfig.title: GetAsyncInvokeConfig
GetAsyncInvokeConfig.summary: Gets asynchronous invocation configurations of a function.

GetAsyncTask.title: GetAsyncTask
GetAsyncTask.summary: Queries the information about an asynchronous task.

GetCustomDomain.title: GetCustomDomain
GetCustomDomain.summary: Queries information about a custom domain name.

GetFunctionCode.title: GetFunctionCode
GetFunctionCode.summary: Queries a code package of a function.

GetLayerVersionByArn.title: GetLayerVersionByArn
GetLayerVersionByArn.summary: Obtain version information of a layer by using ARNs.

GetScalingConfig.title: GetScalingConfig
GetScalingConfig.summary: Gets the scaling settings of a function.

GetSession.title: GetSession
GetSession.summary: You can use this operation to retrieve detailed information about a specific session, including its session ID, associated function, affinity type, lifecycle configuration, status, and instance details. This operation retrieves the current metadata for a session. You can identify the metadata precisely using either the function name or qualifier. This capability enables you to monitor and debug external systems with ease. Only sessions that are in the Active state can be queried.

ListAsyncInvokeConfigs.title: ListAsyncInvokeConfigs
ListAsyncInvokeConfigs.summary: Queries all asynchronous configurations of a function.

ListConcurrencyConfigs.title: ListConcurrencyConfigs
ListConcurrencyConfigs.summary: Queries a list of concurrency configurations.

ListInstances.title: ListInstances
ListInstances.summary: Queries a list of function instances.

ListLayerVersions.title: ListLayerVersions
ListLayerVersions.summary: Gets a list of layer versions.

ListProvisionConfigs.title: ListProvisionConfigs
ListProvisionConfigs.summary: Queries a list of provisioned configurations.

ListScalingConfigs.title: ListScalingConfigs
ListScalingConfigs.summary: Lists the scaling settings of a function.

ListSessions.title: ListSessions
ListSessions.summary: Lists sessions in the Active and/or Expired state(s) under the specified function. Supports filtering by qualifier, status, and session ID, as well as paginated queries. Returns basic session attributes for batch viewing of session distribution and status, helping with operations monitoring and integration with external systems, and enhancing session visibility and management.

ListTriggers.title: ListTriggers
ListTriggers.summary: Queries the triggers of a function.

ListVpcBindings.title: ListVpcBindings
ListVpcBindings.summary: Queries a list of existing VPC connections.

PutAsyncInvokeConfig.title: PutAsyncInvokeConfig
PutAsyncInvokeConfig.summary: Creates or modifies an asynchronous invocation configuration for a function.

UpdateFunction.title: UpdateFunction
UpdateFunction.summary: Updates the information about a function.

UpdateSession.title: UpdateSession
UpdateSession.summary: Updates session configurations while the session is in the Active state, such as lifecycle parameters (e.g., SessionTTLInSeconds and SessionIdleTimeoutInSeconds). After the update takes effect, LastModifiedTime is automatically refreshed. These updates can be used to extend or shorten the validity period of a session and enable dynamic management without changing the execution environment bound to the session.
